original_text: When Balak heard that Balaam had come, he went out to meet him at the city of Moab, on the border formed by the Arnon, at the extremity of the border.
korean_text: 발락은 발람이 온다 함을 듣고 모압 변경의 끝 아르논 가에 있는 성읍까지 가서 그를 영접하고

sentences.original_text: When Balak heard that Balaam had come
he went out to meet him
on the border formed by the Arnon
at the extremity of the border.
